column3: Concept ACK: we need to check for the use of uninitialized memory (UUM) in all tests\n\nThis one fixes `feature_block` which is good. What about the remaining two -- `feature_abortnode` and `rpc_bind`?
Added a commit to enable feature_abortnode as requested by @practicalswift . Can't enable rpc_bind because of this bug here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/17765#issuecomment-602068547

It is the default value, no need to set it to true twice.

```
$ git grep RUN_FUNCTIONAL_TESTS
ci/test/00_setup_env.sh:export RUN_FUNCTIONAL_TESTS=${RUN_FUNCTIONAL_TESTS:-true}
